residential.headline: SOLD BY AB PROPERTY CONSULTANTS-0402961515
residential.description:
This fully brick and well maintained apartment offers value to first home buyer and astute investor for strong growth and rental prospects. Situated towards the back section of the complex and open in the northern aspect balcony, this unit offers private and quiet surrounds. This residence is conveniently located only few minutes stroll to Harris Park, Station, Local Shops, Schools, Parramatta CBD and much more.
• Good size lounge flows to a sunny entertaining balcony for weekend brunches. • Substantial master bedroom equipped with built-in wardrobe and air-condition, 2nd bedroom with built-in robe. • Well-presented kitchen opens onto to the formal dining area. • Generous renovated bathroom with shower screen. • Internal laundry with storage • Single extra oversized car space and high potential rent • PRICE GUIDE $450000-$470000 This gorgeous security complex exuberates value providing high rental potential. Be quick because this excellent opportunity will not last long. With owner determined to SELL, please contact your exclusive agent Atul Bhanushali on 0402 961 515 and Jitender Singh (Jeet) 0410 567 777.

features.otherFeatures: Built-In Wardrobes,Close to Schools,Close to Shops,Close to Transport,Polished Timber Floor

residential.headline: HOUSE + GRANNY FLAT
residential.description:
This exceptionally rare property offers two bedrooms tastefully refurbished house and two bedrooms brand new granny flat! A fresh paint inside and outside of the house and landscaping brings new sense of vibrancy while stunning brand new granny flat is a statement of modern lifestyle.
Granny flat is located in the backside of the house with complete privacy through fencing and separate access from the house. This quality and dual income residence exuberates value providing a perfect position within minutes walk to Seven Hills Train Station, Seven hills Plaza and Bert Oldfield Primary School.
The Main House Features:
• 2 Good size bedrooms with built-in robes • Well-presented kitchen equipped with gas cooking open into the dining area • Separate generous size lounge • Well-maintained bathroom with bathtub and separate toilet • Internal laundry and two carports • Giving you comfort this house is fitted with ducted air-conditioning • Sunny patio in backside with courtyard ideal for relaxation and entertainment
The Granny Flat Features: • 2 Good size bedrooms with built-in robes • Contemporary open plan kitchen fitted with gas cooktop, oven and dishwasher. Kitchen joined with living room, giving lots of space to move around. • Ultra modern fully tiled bathroom with shower screen • The air-conditioning in living area provides comfort for all seasons. • The side leafy courtyard and sunny patio in front ideal for relaxation and entertainment. • Price Guide $775000-$852000 Tailored to the astute investor seeking a high yielding rental income & to the family seeking a large family home with rental income from the granny flat to assist with the mortgage. Owner has made the decision to sell, so don't delay to secure this property, please contact your exclusive agent Jitender Singh 0410 567 777 and Atul Bhanushali on 0402 961 515
